page.title: 19EMPLOYMENT PARENTS' JOBS
page.content: The children of the top junior class of Gilwern C.P. School held a survey to see the occupations of their parents.The results are as follows:- MOTHERS' OCCUPATIONS.16 housewives, 6 teachers,5 nurses,3 shopkeepers, a hairdresser,an Avon Lady,a telephonist,an employment officer,a home help and a radiographer. FATHERS' OCCUPATIONS. 5 teachers,3 engineers,3 factory workers,3 steel workers,2 farmers,2 insurance managers,a tax officer,a chemist,a businessman,a newspaper manager,an accountant,a lecturer,a salesman,a gas man,a minister,a doctor,a haulage contractor,a laboratory worker,a bus driver,2 handimen,a site agent,a brick layer and 2 unemployed.
